EmailTemplate.name: EMEA_Event_Jaxx_Germany_Q216.Post-event
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Joining Pivotal at JAX 2016
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for joining Pivotal and the Spring community at JAX Germany, where we shared how enterprises are adopting Cloud Native application architectures to drive modern, software experiences for their customers. Learn more about becoming Cloud Native on our Cloud Native microsite <[[http://pivotal.io/cloud-native]]> and download your free copy of the Oâ€™Reilly eBook, Migrating to Cloud Native Applications <[[http://pivotal.io/platform/migrating-to-cloud-native-application-architectures-ebook]]> from the Pivotal site.
Request a FREE hands-on, on site, workshop <[[http://pivotal.io/cloud-native-workshop]]> to learn about modern application design concepts using Spring Boot and Cloud Foundry. And learn more about Spring and Cloud Foundry through Pivotal Academy training <[[http://pivotal.io/academy]]>.
Check out the Pivotal blog <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/]]> and Spring Blog <[[https://spring.io/blog]]> to discover all the latest news, videos, blogs and replays on Spring technologies and Pivotal solutions.
We hope to see you again soon at a future event <[[https://pivotal.io/news-events]]>!
Thanks,
The Pivotal Team
